snippet.title: The Great Empire: Relic Of Egypt
snippet.description:
When an ancient pharaoh goes on a rampage after being awakened from his eternal slumber, the current pharaoh puts his honeymoon on pause and sets out to capture the vile villain and restore his land to its former beauty. Fulfill your destiny and claim the victory that is yours as the leader of the great empire!

• Captivating, adventurous story
• Dozens of cleverly designed levels
• Thrilling original soundtrack
• Learn-as-you-play instructions
• Simple point-and-click controls
